Package cs2030.simulator

Class EventSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.EventSimulator
  • public class EventSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    The main logic for processing events. It implements two main functions: initialization and processing events in a functional way.

    It has one public static field called randomGenerator, which is assigned an instance of RandomGenerator with proper parameters when this class itself is initialized with constructor.

    It has one public instance field called statistics, which stores all relavant statistics happened in the simulation.

    It has six private instance fields: customers (a list storing all customers), result (a priority queue storing the records of events), events (a priority queue where events go in and out with accordance to the processing rules), servers (an array storing the servers), probabilityOfGreedy and currentTime.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventSimulator

        public EventSimulator​(int numOfServers,
                      int numOfSelfCheckout,
                      int seed,
                      double lambda,
                      double mu,
                      double rho,
                      double pr,
                      double pg,
                      int queueLength)
        Constructor for the EventSimulator.
        Parameters:
        numOfServers - number of servers
        numOfSelfCheckout - number of self checkout counters
        seed - seed for RandomGenerator
        lambda - arrival rate
        mu - service rate
        rho - resting rate
        pr - probability of resting
        pg - probability of greedy customer
        queueLength - maximum length of waiting queue
